Frequently Asked Questions

Everything you need to know about our White-Label IVR Platform

General

What is a White-Label IVR Platform?

A White-Label IVR Platform is a complete multi-tenant system that allows businesses to provide their own branded Interactive Voice Response service. Each tenant gets their own isolated IVR system with custom branding, departments, and AI-powered call routing.

How is this different from traditional IVR systems?

Our platform is multi-tenant, meaning multiple businesses can use the same infrastructure while maintaining complete data isolation. It includes AI-powered routing, CRM integration, and modern cloud architecture for better scalability and performance.

Do I need technical expertise to set up the system?

No technical expertise required! Our platform includes a user-friendly dashboard for configuration, pre-built department templates, and automated setup. Most customers are up and running within 24 hours.

Features & Capabilities

What AI capabilities are included?

Our platform includes intent recognition, sentiment analysis, smart call routing, customer tier classification, and real-time language detection. The AI learns from each interaction to improve routing accuracy over time.

Which CRM systems do you integrate with?

We support Salesforce, HubSpot, Pipedrive, and custom CRM systems via REST APIs. Integration includes real-time contact sync, interaction logging, and customer context loading during calls.

Can I customize the branding and greetings?

Yes! Complete white-label customization including company colors, logos, custom greetings, hold music, and even custom voice prompts. Your customers will never know you're using a third-party service.

How many departments can I create?

Basic plan includes 2 departments, Premium includes 5, and Enterprise includes unlimited departments. Each department can have custom routing rules, business hours, and agent assignments.

Pricing & Billing

How does the per-tenant pricing work?

Unlike traditional per-user pricing, we charge per tenant (your business). This means you can have unlimited agents and departments within your tenant without additional per-user fees.

What happens if I exceed my included minutes?

Additional minutes are charged at $0.05 per minute. You can monitor your usage in real-time through the dashboard and upgrade your plan anytime to get more included minutes.

Is there a setup fee?

Setup is free for all plans! We also provide free migration assistance and training to help you get started quickly.

Can I change plans anytime?

Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately, and we'll prorate any billing differences.

Security & Compliance

Is my customer data secure?

Absolutely! We use AES-256 encryption for all data at rest and in transit, complete tenant isolation, and enterprise-grade security measures. All data is stored in SOC 2 compliant data centers.

Do you comply with GDPR and CCPA?

Yes, we're fully GDPR and CCPA compliant with data anonymization, right-to-deletion capabilities, consent management, and complete audit trails for all data access.

Can I use this for healthcare organizations?

Yes, our platform supports HIPAA compliance with additional security measures, data encryption, and audit logging required for healthcare organizations.

Technical & Support

What is the uptime guarantee?

We guarantee 99.9% uptime with enterprise-grade infrastructure, automatic failover, and 24/7 monitoring. Our SLA includes credits for any downtime exceeding the guarantee.

Do you provide API access?

Yes, Enterprise plans include full REST API access for custom integrations, webhooks for real-time events, and comprehensive documentation with code examples.

What kind of support do you offer?

Basic plans include email support, Premium includes priority support, and Enterprise includes 24/7 dedicated support with a dedicated account manager.

Can I export my data?

Yes, you can export all your data including call logs, customer interactions, and analytics at any time. We also provide data migration assistance if you decide to switch platforms.

Still Have Questions?

Our team is here to help! Contact us for personalized answers to your specific questions.
